title: I'm Munawer Ali and
Discription: a Flutter app developer with 3+ years of experience. I specialize in creating diverse applications—be it e-commerce, food ordering, jewelry apps, or complex projects. From concept to code, I bring ideas to life with a blend of creativity and precision. Let's collaborate on your next innovative project!

Education.title: SSC certificate
Education.Discription: I earned my SSC certificate from High School in 2022.

Experience.title: Flutter
Experience.Discription: a proficient Flutter app developer with a passion for crafting exceptional mobile experiences. Over the past 3+ years, I've been deeply immersed in Flutter development, working on a variety of projects. My journey includes collaborating with freelance clients, where I've successfully delivered innovative solutions for their unique needs.

Experience.title: Andriod Developer
Experience.Discription: In the world of Android, I specialize in crafting diverse applications, from e-commerce platforms and food ordering apps to intricate jewelry applications and complex projects. Simultaneously, my proficiency in Android development, particularly using Kotlin, adds an extra layer to my skill set.

Experience.title: Kotlin
Experience.Discription: an adaptable developer dedicated to crafting exceptional mobile experiences. With a robust background spanning over 3+ years, I've immersed myself in the dynamic worlds of Kotlin.

Experience.title: Firebase
Experience.Discription: working on firebase more then 2+ years , until used it in all applications and delivered innovative solutions for their unique needs.
